universaal:SipmleConfigItem.universaal:label: IP
universaal:SipmleConfigItem.universaal:description: IP address of server, in URL parseable format (e.g. xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)

universaal:SipmleConfigItem.universaal:label: Port
universaal:SipmleConfigItem.universaal:description: Port in which the server is providing the service

universaal:SipmleConfigItem.universaal:label: Service
universaal:SipmleConfigItem.universaal:description: Web Service path in the server
